NAME: Viscum Album

Local skin reactions eg swelling & dead skin (inj)| chills| fever| headache| chest pain| hypotension & allergic reactions. || Potentially Fatal: 3 cytotoxic compds: alkaloids| viscotoxins & lectins are present. Viscotoxins may cause hypotension| bradycardia| arterial vasoconstriction & a negative inotropic effect| & may act as acetylcholine agonists. The lectins show toxic effects in animals similar to those seen with ricin.
